reviews.sentence: Nice hotel with a great location in the center of Saigon. Friendly and helpful staff great service great breakfast and food in the restaurant on the first floor clean room perfect location. The rooms were a bit old and in need of renovation our room had a damp smell although we could get new pillows so the worst smell disappeared. We also had ants in our room.
Happy. Staff performance is excellent great location room cleanliness. Needs upgrade gyms equipment hotel needs a facelift carpets etc. Overall it is a good hotel.

A Very Noisy Hotel. I think that when you are doing a multi centred holiday it is inevitable that you compare hotels. The New World in Saigon is definitely the hotel we have liked the least. It certainly is n’t a 5 star hotel by European standards. The whole hotel needs to be modernised. The furniture in the lobby and bar are looking very shabby and out of date. The same can be said about the rooms. Our room was relatively large but everything is looking very tired. I would only give them about 510 for cleanliness. The bathroom was even worse. Tiles need re grouting and there is a grubby shower curtain around the bath. The shower attachment squirted water out everywhere. The inside of the bath is stained. It should all have been updated several years ago. On arrival we decided to eat in the hotel for our first night. The whole thing was a disaster. We were given a table on a mezzanine overlooking the lobby. There was a wedding being held that day. Children from the wedding were running around the lobby on their own screaming and shouting. Because of the acoustics of the front entrance the noise was unbelievable. There were several hotel staff there but no attempt was made to quieten the children. It was like trying to eat a meal in a children ’s playground. When we complained about it the staff really were unable to cope with us and the problem. Their attitude towards us was in fact rather insulting. They did send us a basket of fruit as compensation but it really did n’t compensate for the spoilt meal and the incompetent staff. Having said that we generally found the rest of the hotel staff very pleasant and helpful. The worst problem about the hotel however is the constant roar of the traffic. The hotel has roads on three sides and from most parts of the building including the rooms there is a constant day and night drone of traffic noise. The windows are only single glazed. We were not happy in this hotel nor could we recommend it to anyone.

Right in the guts of everything. Friendly and efficient staff who are eager to help. They very efficiently assisted with a small problem relating to my booking which turned out to be my fault. The room I stayed in will need a refurbishment in the next few years but if was fine. Recommended would stay again.

Old rooms. Carpet on all rooms and very long time sin e renovation if any. Makes the room smell bad especially during et season wet old carpet smell. Staff was exeptional though and did all they could to make us happy. We changed room twice to higher floor where the rooms obviously had a higher turnover with guest and therefore did not smell that bad. Not so great value for money since there has come many newer hotels more central at the same price range. Nice pool area.

Fantastic find. Only negative would be the need for renovations in the room. Everything else was fantastic. Bed was comfortable air con great. Club lounge facilities good. The pool was a perfect temperature and nice an deep at one end. Even the lounges were comfortable.

An elite engironment in the heart of the city. Professional fancy comfortable. All services were outstanding. The infrastructure like hvac and rooms has to be renewed. Staff is great all questions answered all problems solved. The full breakfast supports you all day.

Great location nice but dated hotel but currently under refurbishment. The service level at this hotel was excellent. To be honest I would probably have only given the hotel 3 stars but the service level pushed it up to 4The hotel is currently under refurbishment but you have staff directing you to each location so there is no issue finding where the temporary reception area is etc. The rooms themselves are very dated but once again I am not rating them too bad as they will hopefully be refurbishing all rooms over the coming year. The room was clean but compact and my pet hate is a shower curtain over a bath which they will hopefully update. The breakfast was excellent and the pool area on the rooftop was also great. The location was a short walk to local attractions and good food spots.

Alright. No doubt the hotel is suffering under the renovations which is ongoing. Hard to be in the hotel during the day because of noise. Hotel feels old but well maintained. Look forward to staying there when they finish and stop the banging and hammering all day.

NEWORLDSAIGONHOTEL Every one of us at the luxury New World Saigon Hotel in Vietnam wants to make your stay with us a pleasure whether you ’re here on business or leisure … or even to get married. Great food is an important part of any stay and we have three excellent restaurants serving Chinese Japanese and international cuisines. We make work a little easier with complimentary Internet service in your room and throughout the hotel flexible venues for meetings and conferences of all sizes and a business center that can handle all your needs from office supplies and photocopying to secretarial and translation support. We make holidays more enjoyable with a fitness center equipped with full range of professional Technogym equipment a hydrotherapy area with massage showers steam bath sauna and Jacuzi an outdoor swimming pool a tennis court and spa and massage services. Sightseeing and shopping are made easier with our private limousine service and a complimentary city shuttle service that makes it easy to move around Ho Chi Minh City. And we love weddings. If you ’re getting married we can make everything you dream of come true. We would like to inform you that the hotel is undergoing renovations. During this period we ensure that the hotel continues to provide exceptional service. We would certainly do our best to keep the construction disturbance to the very minimum but would like to apologize in advance for any inconvenience this might cause you during your stay with us.

Top location Great Service. I found the hotel staff very welcoming and the rooms comfortable although there were renovations being done when i was there. the location to the shopping district was amazing as i stayed at the Pullman Saigon over Christmas and we were constantly in cabsRecomend this Hotel and have just booked 10 days in December 2019.
In the heart of city Ben Thanh market and restaurants are a round every corner. Newly renovated rooms are spacious.

December 2019. A property that is in process of rejuvenation however generally good stay. 11th floor suite was clean and expansive but air con in living area did not appear to be operating in same manner as that in bedroom. External noise was incredible and very disturbing with sounds of motor bikes and cars and the warning signals from buses clearly audible in the room throughout the night. Room was overpriced for what was provided. Pool area was pleasant but pool furniture and surrounds need to be updated to justify its price tag. General serviced from staff was excellent and all staff were incredibly attentive and lovely to deal with.

Excellent service safe good location newly renovated and superb value hotel. Will stay again. Perfect location right in City Center. Walking distance to market many places of interest including Takashimaya shopping mall. Many Coffee outlets next to hotel so u can sit by and watch the city actions. Hustle bustle n yet very peaceful Bcos there is a nice park opposite the hotel. Superb nice classy newly renovated n v clean room. Much nicer than the photos. NO renovation noise at all. Everything in the room are new including aircon n water heater Yummy wide varieties breakfast esp the porridge. At breakfast u can order drinks different types of tea coffee including Vietnamese coffee delicious. Nice Swimming pool. My hubby n daughter played a good chess game in the garden giant chess set. Biggest 5 stars hotel in HCM n yet have very kind personal caring mgmt to crew team. They helped you get good hotel transport from airport and safe cab to airport. Best is best value. We got best deal in Agoda. They are found in Singapore Changi Recommends so we booked with confidence.

A great conveniently located luxurious hotel. New World Saigon is a great hotel in the centre of District 1. Walking distance from everything you had want to check out 5 30min. The hotel is beautiful newly renovated. The rooms are great. We had some issues with the lighting in our room but they were able to send someone to fix it even at 3 am. Some of the rooms have a really great view of the city. it is worth paying for the view in my opinion. We had to check in very late 2 am and the GM waited to greet us gave us an upgrade on account of it being our honeymoon. A really nice touch to enhance the stay. Finally the breakfast was great.

New World Hotel is back refreshed. Very nicely renovated and fresh come back for the New World Hotel. The location is great close to the market and shopping with also good restaurants nearby. The swimming pool and area is the best in Saigon. The gym has what is needed for a good exercise.
Good. Looks awesome after the renovation on the exterior of the hotel. Did nothing to the standard rooms other than the rooms on club floor.

Amazing Central Location. Great location only minutes from walking street and the surrounding area. The room was on the 9th floor and looked newly renovated. Nice and spacious with a comfortable bed and soft pillows. Great walk in shower. We had the Spa package so took full use of this. Lovely swimming pool with enough sun loungers. That was the main reason we chose the hotel and for its central location. Would come back again.
I fully recommend New World Hotel for Saigon staying. Location was perfect just in city centerRom is new updated one and it was very nice and 10th floor lounge was greatPol area was great.
